description:
Kageyama is a first year student at Karasuno High School. He is currently a setter. In junior high school, he was referred to as the "King of the Court", notorious for his arrogant demeanor and his inability to cooperate with teammates, instead opting to order them around. After enrolling in Karasuno High School and joining the volleyball club where he meets Hinata, his opinions start to change and he begins to understand the importance of teamwork in a team sport.
Source: Wiki
name: Kageyama Tobio
